DOC.brief_summary: To determine if Iscar Quercus improves immune function and quality of life among patients with stage IV non-small cell lung cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Iscar for Second Line Treatment of Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: RAndomized pilot study of supplemental Iscar in combination with Gemcitabine vs. Gemcitabine alone as second line treatment for advanced non-small cell lung cancer.
DOC.criteria: newly diagnosed IIIB and IV NSCLC who have failed one prior line of chemo Karnofsky score 60% or greater patients who will be treated with Gemcitabine
